awd_abstract_narration: This award provides funds to aid in the purchase of several                    items of modern research equipment, including a DNA                             synthesizer, confocal microscope and a computer workstation                     for molecular graphics applications.  The group of                              researchers who will benefit from the equipment have diverse                    research programs in biochemistry and in developmental and                      cellular biology.  These include studies of gene structure                      and regulation, and the movement of organelles and cells                        during development of both plants and animals.  The                             equipment provided is typical of advanced equipment                             developed during the last few years and now essential to                        research in most areas of modern biology.

inst.org_lgl_bus_name: THE REGENTS OF THE UNIVERSITY OF COLORADO
